name: Maggi Curry Flavour Noodles
description: Maggi 2 Minute Curry Noodles are quick, convenient and delicious. Each pack brings you a taste of Malaysia and is ready in just two minutes. Maggi 2 Minute Curry Noodles come with a noodle cake and an authentic hot curry flavour sachet of mixed herbs and spices including chilli, coriander, onion and cumin; for great flavour. Maggi® 2 Minute Noodles are simple to make. Empty the Maggi 2 Minute Noodles and curry flavour sachet into a 400ml pan of boiling water, and simmer for 2 minutes whilst stirring gently. There you have it, delicious curry noodles in just two minutes! *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
